#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x);

using namespace std;

int subsetsum(int a[],int n,int k)
{
    if(k==0)
        return 1;
    if(n==0 && k!=0)
        return 0;

    if(a[n-1]>k)
        return subsetsum(a,n-1,k);

    return subsetsum(a,n-1,k)||subsetsum(a,n-1,k-a[n-1]);
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,k,i;

    S(t);
    while(t-->0)
    {
        S(n);
        S(k);
        int a[n];

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            S(a[i]);

        if(subsetsum(a,n,k))
            printf("1\n");
        else
            printf("0\n");
    }

return 0;
}
